page.title: 11Employment & Industry cont'd
page.content: As the state of factory order books fluctuates, workers are sometimes paid off or taken on. { Carr's Mill }was first built in 1885 and has always been one of the main employers in Silloth.The Mill produces flour and various kinds of animal foodstuffs. It provides quite a lot of business for the docks. The other main businesses at the dock area are some cattle trade and{Harrison's,} who deal in the main with bulk cement and some general cargo. Recently, the {English {Industrial Estates}built about 6 small factory units to help small businesses to set up. {Tourism}also plays an important part in Silloth - see earlier pages. There are a lot of shops for the size of Silloth because of tourism. The hotels cafes shops and caravan parks all provide lots of seasonal employment.
